TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer in which a moderate number of cancer cells have spread throughout the body.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II multiple myeloma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "mieloma múltiple en estadio II"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer en el que una cantidad moderada de células cancerosas se ha diseminado por todo el cuerpo.
